title: Random Number Generation in Go | Challenge
description: This challenge aims to test your ability to generate random numbers using the math/rand package in Golang.

meta.title: Mastering Random Number Generation in Go
meta.description: Explore the power of the math/rand package in Golang to generate random integers and floats within a specified range.
meta.keywords: mathrand, go, golang, go labs, go playground online, random number generation, programming challenge, go lab, go practice
